segments.text: Good afternoon , Miss Tao . Please sit down .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good afternoon , Mr . Black . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ Ve read your application materials with interest . Now I want to ask you a few questions , if you don ’ t mind .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As you please . I ’ m ready .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The first is why you choose our company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think yours is a well-known advertising company , so I ’ m sure to get opportunities to display my talent in advertisement .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why do you want to quit your present company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the company has some financial problems . People there are all thinking of quitting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , when do you think you can come over to work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One week after I have submitted my resignation paper .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When you start to work , I ’ ll give you $ 3,000 a month .
segments.speaker: S1
